artist: Painter: After Godfried Schalcken; Lithographer: Gustav Wolff
description: young woman in a dark interior holding a candle; candlestick on table below; leaning on a cushion; frame of picture visible on wall at left
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

Below image in black: Gemalt von Godfried Schalken  Lithogr von G. Wolff Dresden / EIN MADCHEN BEIM LICHTSCHEIN / (Dresdener Galerie) / 58 | on sheet in pencil: 2-372
title: Young Woman by Candlelight
